name: Coillte Panel Products Ltd
description:
Coillte Panel Products is part of Coillte, the Irish Forestry Company, which owns over 442,000 hectares of FSC® certified forest. For a timber products company, this parentage is a huge advantage.

It differentiates Coillte Panel Products, puts us ahead of the rest. At all stages, we can properly control the brands we produce - manufacture, market and support them. 

Medite MDF and SmartPly OSB are highly-regarded brands. Both products are synonymous for quality, choice and innovation. 

Whether you’re the specifier, architect or end-user, we make the product with the variant you need. And it’ll make the grade.

In the powerful ranges of Medite and SmartPly, there’s a panel that will do exactly what you
need it to do. Now with constant innovation, our brands are covering more ground than any other on the market.

With Medite and SmartPly to our name; with a connection to thousands of hectares of forest; with security of supply and a record of innovation; Coillte Panel Products is well placed to offer solutions.

product_images.title: Medite Tricoya
product_images.description: The worlds first Extreme Durable MDF.

product_images.title: SmartPly SitePtrotect and Site Protect Plus
product_images.description: SmartPly SiteProtect is a highly engineered and improved moisture resistant OSB3 coated panel specification designed to save both time and money in the most demanding hoarding applications.

product_images.title: SmartPly OSB3
product_images.description: SmartPly OSB3 is a highly engineered moisture resistant load bearing panel designed for use in humid conditions and is therefore ideal for many structural and non structural applications in both internal and protected external environments.

product_images.title: SmartPly OSB2
product_images.description: SmartPly OSB2 is an egineered load bearing panel designed for use in both structural and non structural applications in dry conditions.

product_images.title: Medite FQ MDF
product_images.description: An MDF panel developed specifically with a higher density and improved moisture resistance making it ideal for use in laminated flooring applications.

product_images.title: Medite Ecologique MDF
product_images.description: An MDF panel with Zero Added Formaldehyde developed specifically for use in environmentally sensitive interior applications where formaldehyde emissions need to be kept to the minimum.

product_images.title: Medite Exterior MDF
product_images.description: Medite Exterior is an MDF panel developed specifically for use in a wide range of external applications and gives all the design freedom of interior MDF.

product_images.title: Medite FR MDF
product_images.description: Medite FR (Flame Retardant) Euro Class B & C is an MDF panel developed specifically for use in situations where a Euro Class B or Class C board is required for building regulations.

product_images.title: Medite MR MDF
product_images.description: Medite MR is a moisture resitstant MDF panel designed for use in humid conditions in accordance with MDF.H (Option 1) as defined in EN 622 part 5 so ideal for applications such as kitchen and barthroom furniture, window and skirting boards.

product_images.title: Medite Ultralite MDF
product_images.description: Ultralite MDF producted by Medite , maintains the excellent surface smoothness and stability of normal MDF.

product_images.title: Medite Premier MDF
product_images.description: Medite Premier MDF is produced using superior wood refining technology and specially designed resins.
